article.description: Omar Thomas scored a career-high 32 points to lead Texas-El Paso to a 76-65 win over La. Tech Thursday.
article.headline: Miners' Thomas scores career-high 32 points
article.linkText: UTEP finally gets win on La. Tech's home court
article.story: RUSTON, La. (AP) -- Omar Thomas scored a career-high 32 points to lead Texas-El Paso to a 76-65 win over Louisiana Tech Thursday night. Thomas was 13-of-18 from the field and 6-of-7 from the free-throw line. Filiberto Rivera added 13 points and Roy Smallwood added 10 for UTEP (21-5, 12-4 Western Athletic Conference). Corey Dean led the Bulldogs (13-12, 7-8) with 20 points, while Paul Millsap added 16 and grabbed 12 rebounds. Barry Thompson had 11 points. It marked the first time in six tries that UTEP was able to get a win against the Bulldogs on their home court.
